/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, stand tall and proud, their facades adorned with balconies that add a touch of charm to the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban maze. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
